item.title: Owner, Mod, Admin has logged in
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

if(playerRights >= 3) { NewHP = playerLevel[3]; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" [Owner] has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players."; }

Trying for it to say, NAME [owner] has logged in. Doesn’t work. No compiler errors…
Here is original…WORKS…

NewHP = playerLevel[3];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =  playerName+" [Member] has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
}

Read full topic
